description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end and rear roof extension (following demolition of existing rear roof extension)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings:, Proposed East Elevation drawing no. DR_PRO_EAST_ELV_HIP_002, Proposed Front and rear Elevation drawing no. DR_PRO_FRONT_REAR_ELV_HIP_002, Proposed West Elevation drawing no. DR_PRO_WEST_ELV_HIP_002 and Proposed Roof Plan drawing no. DR_PRO_FLOOR_ROOF_PLAN_002

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with the submitted application form or approved drawings: Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12.

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).

| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, the upper floor side facing window proposed shall be obscure glazed and non-opening for a height of 1.7m, as measured from finished floor level.
Reason: To protect the amenity of surrounding occupiers in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
